title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 642.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 642.1 - General

State Regulations

There is established a Division of Law Enforcement within the

Department of Environmental Conservation. The Division of Law Enforcement shall
be sanctioned as the New York State Environmental Conservation Police. The
organization of the division including, but not limited to, reporting line of
authority and chain of command shall be established in the policies and
procedures manual of the Department of Environmental

Conservation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
642.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
